definition: to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: Don't give me any lip service. I want to see some action!
sentences.chinese: 別對我說好聽的，我要見你的行動。

sentences.english: Q30: Does reading have anything to do with my oral English?
sentences.chinese: 讀書跟說好英文怎麼會有關係？

sentences.english: I said yes agreeably , and hanged off.
sentences.chinese: 我欣然地說好的，然後就掛斷了。

sentences.english: If we can speak English well,we will have more chance to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們能說好英語，我們就有更多的機會成功。

sentences.english: Why do you always speak evil things of me and not good?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼你總是對我過不去，說惡不說好？

sentences.english: One day the president said yes, the next no.
sentences.chinese: 總統經常第一天說好，第二天又反悔。

sentences.english: I'm sure you can speak good English after finishing this book.
sentences.chinese: 我相信你學完這本書一定可以說好英語。

sentences.english: We said, only talk about love do not talk about love.
sentences.chinese: 我們說好，只談喜歡不談愛。

sentences.english: Being always clumsy when scolded, I always only come to an agreement as did. .
sentences.chinese: 有人罵老拙，老拙只說好。

sentences.english: Say forever, I do not know how to spread.
sentences.chinese: 羭說好永遠的，不知怎麼就散了。

sentences.english: If that promise is like the wind not tested.
sentences.chinese: 說好的承諾是否會像風一樣經不起考驗。

sentences.english: I waited for her cremains by the ashes furnace.
sentences.chinese: 骨灰出爐前我們和火化師父說好在爐前等。

sentences.english: Even if you don't Iike it?-No, of course not.
sentences.chinese: 就算是對你不喜歡的事情也說好？

sentences.english: And he told me I could go to the canteen to get paste, he had arranged well with the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 臨走時說，糨子到伙房去打，他已經跟炊事員說好了。

sentences.english: Her husband took her to her home, say, in her day.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫帶着女兒去了婆婆家，說好，在婆家玩一天。

sentences.english: Okay, not to dare to eat the meal drink this cup of wine?
sentences.chinese: 好說好說，不盡力敢來喫這頓飯喝這杯酒嗎？

definition: It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
it doesn't matter
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
surname Huan
to pay back/to return
manner/pattern/way/appearance/shape/classifier: kind, type
you (plural)
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
or/still/nevertheless/had better
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
to bear fruit/CL:個|个[ge4]
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
